The '''Dendroculus''' (plural '''Dendroculi''') is an Adventure Item that can be found scattered across [[Sumeru]]. Dendroculi can be offered to any [[Statue of The Seven]] in Sumeru for rewards. Dendroculi can only be found in the overworld, and will not appear in [[Chests]]. Dendroculi are also limited and do not respawn.

When an overworld Dendroculus is within close proximity of a player, an icon will appear on their minimap along with a sound effect. Players can also use a [[Dendroculus Resonance Stone]] to mark the location of a Dendroculus on the map.

As of [[Version/3.4|Version 3.4]], 235 Dendroculi can be found in the overworld, allowing only 9 Levels (5/40) of the [[Statue of The Seven]] to be claimable, with future updates adding new Dendroculi Spawns.
